greetings.response: Welcome to our Travel Agency! How can I assist you today?

greeting-help.response: Sure! I can help you with destinations, bookings, travel packages, and more. What specifically are you interested in?

destination_inquiry.response: We offer amazing destinations worldwide! Are you interested in specific types of travel?

destination_inquiry-types.response: Great choice! Let me tell you about our top {type} destinations.

destination_inquiry-types-details.response: We have some fantastic {type} packages. Would you like to hear about specific locations or pricing?

destination-booking.response: Wonderful! I'll connect you with our booking specialist to customize your perfect {type} trip.

travel_packages.response: We have a variety of travel packages! Are you looking for international or domestic packages?

travel_packages-type.response: Our {type} packages offer unique experiences. What's your preferred duration?

travel_packages-type-duration.response: Perfect! We have {type} {duration} packages. Would you like to see specific options?

package-details.response: Great! I'll send you our top {type} {duration} package recommendations.

booking_inquiry.response: Booking a trip is easy! What would you like to book - flights, hotels, or complete travel packages?

booking_inquiry-type.response: Excellent! For {type} booking, I'll need some additional details. What are your travel dates?

booking_inquiry-type-dates.response: Got it! How many travelers will be joining?

booking-travelers.response: Perfect! Let's customize your {type} booking for {travelers}.

travel_requirements.response: Travel documentation is crucial! Which country are you planning to visit?

travel_requirements-country.response: For {country}, here are the key travel requirements. Do you need detailed visa information?
I'll provide comprehensive visa and entry requirements for {country}.

customer_support.response: Our support team is ready to help! What kind of assistance do you need?

customer_support-types.response: I understand you need help with {type}. Can you provide more details?

customer_support-types-details.response: Thank you for providing details. Our team will assist you promptly.

pricing_inquiry.response: We offer competitive pricing! What type of travel are you interested in?

pricing_inquiry-type.response: Our {type} travel options range from affordable to premium. What's your budget range?

pricing_inquiry-type-budget.response: Great! I can help you find {type} options within your {budget} budget.

agency_info.response: We're Sunshine Travel, specializing in dream vacations since 2010. We offer expert planning for all travel types. Would you like to know about our team, awards, or service areas?

agency_info-details.response: Our team includes 50+ certified travel experts specializing in regions worldwide.

agency_info-awards.response: We're proud recipients of the 'Best Travel Agency 2023' award by Travel+Leisure.

website_help.response: Our website sections include: Destinations, Special Offers, Travel Guides, and Contact. Which section do you need help with?

website_help-section.response: To access {section}: 1) Click the menu icon 2) Select '{section}' 3) Use filters to refine results. Need more specific guidance?

booking_steps.response: Our booking process: 1) Search trips 2) Select package 3) Complete traveler details 4) Secure payment. Which step do you need explained?

response_options.search: Use our destination filters or search bar to find trips matching your preferences
response_options.select: Click any package to see full itinerary, prices, and availability calendar
response_options.traveler details: Have passport information and special requests ready before starting
response_options.payment: We accept all major cards; your reservation is confirmed only after payment

travel_docs.response: For international travel, you'll typically need: 1) Valid passport 2) Visas (if required) 3) Travel insurance. Specify a country for exact requirements.

response_options.USA: ESTA authorization for visa waiver, passport valid for stay duration
response_options.Europe: Schengen visa if required, passport with 3+ months validity
response_options.Thailand: 30-day visa exemption for most passports, proof of onward travel
response_options.Brazil: e-Visa for tourism, yellow fever certificate if visiting certain areas

contact_support.response: Our support options: 1) Live chat (Mon-Fri 9AM-6PM) 2) Email response within 24h 3) Phone: +1 (800) 555-TRAVEL. Which method works best?

response_options.chat: Click the blue chat icon in the bottom-right of any page
response_options.email: Send inquiries to help@sunshinetravel.com with your booking reference
response_options.phone: Call +1 (800) 555-TRAVEL (press 1 for bookings, 2 for existing reservations)
response_options.callback: Visit our Contact page to request a callback within 2 business hours
